13:45:33</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {

     var tx = inputs.tx
	 var cmdout = inputs.cmdout;
     
     try {
        tx.output = cmdout;
       
        output = JSON.parse(cmdout)

        tx.transaction_id = output.resp.transactionId
        tx.transaction_hash = output.resp.transactionHash

        tx.account_id = output.receipt.accountId

        gr = new GlideRecord("x_snc_hspoke_account")
        gr.initialize()
        gr.name = output.receipt.accountId
        gr.account_id = output.receipt.accountId
        gr.insert()

        tx.account = gr.sys_id

        if (output.receipt.status == 'SUCCESS') {
            tx.status = 'completed'
            tx.hedera_status = output.receipt.status
        } else {
            throw Error("Hedera status is not success")
        }	
    } catch (e) {
        tx.out_parsing_log = e.toString()
		tx.hedera_status = output.error.status
        tx.status = 'failed'
    } finally {
        tx.update() 
    }
  
})(inputs, outputs);
</value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value 13:45:38</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {

     var tx = inputs.tx
	 var cmdout = inputs.cmdout;
     
     try {
        tx.output = cmdout;
       
        output = JSON.parse(cmdout)

        tx.transaction_id = output.resp.transactionId
        tx.transaction_hash = output.resp.transactionHash

        tx.account_id = output.receipt.accountId

        gr = new GlideRecord("x_snc_hspoke_account")
        gr.initialize()
        gr.name = output.receipt.accountId
        gr.account_id = output.receipt.accountId
        gr.insert()

        tx.account = gr.sys_id

        if (output.receipt.status == 'SUCCESS') {
            tx.status = 'completed'
            tx.hedera_status = output.receipt.status
        } else {
            throw Error("Hedera status is not success")
        }	
    } catch (e) {
        tx.out_parsing_log = e.toString()
		tx.hedera_status = output.error.status
        tx.status = 'failed'
    } finally {
        tx.update() 
    }
  
})(inputs, outputs);
